analysis.description:
BWData.addBoostFromTile (/unique_chucks/40/0xe859060db5cb195620992fc31705d2f45d3adf6e.sol#530-546) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _tile.claimer == _attacker
	- _tile.claimer == _defender

BWService.storeInitialClaim has external calls inside a loop:
	- isNewTile = bwData.isNewTile(tileId) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe859060db5cb195620992fc31705d2f45d3adf6e.sol#130-132)

BWService.storeInitialClaim has external calls inside a loop:
	- bwData.storeClaim(tileId,_msgSender,valuePerBlockInWei) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe859060db5cb195620992fc31705d2f45d3adf6e.sol#140)

BWService.fortifyClaims has external calls inside a loop:
	- (claimer,blockValue) = bwData.getTileClaimerAndBlockValue(_claimedTileIds[i]) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe859060db5cb195620992fc31705d2f45d3adf6e.sol#154-155)

Reentrancy in BWService.attackTile (/unique_chucks/40/0xe859060db5cb195620992fc31705d2f45d3adf6e.sol#193-263):
	External calls:
	- (claimer,blockValue) = bwData.getTileClaimerAndBlockValue(_tileId) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe859060db5cb195620992fc31705d2f45d3adf6e.sol#201-202)
	- (attackBoost,defendBoost) = bwData.calculateBattleBoost(_tileId,_msgSender,claimer) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe859060db5cb195620992fc31705d2f45d3adf6e.sol#211-213)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- seed (/unique_chucks/40/0xe859060db5cb195620992fc31705d2f45d3adf6e.sol#224)

BWData.addUser (/unique_chucks/40/0xe859060db5cb195620992fc31705d2f45d3adf6e.sol#440-442) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(user.creationTime == 0) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe859060db5cb195620992fc31705d2f45d3adf6e.sol#441-442)

BWData.hasUser (/unique_chucks/40/0xe859060db5cb195620992fc31705d2f45d3adf6e.sol#442-445) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- users[_user].creationTime != 0 (/unique_chucks/40/0xe859060db5cb195620992fc31705d2f45d3adf6e.sol#445)

BWData.addBoostFromTile (/unique_chucks/40/0xe859060db5cb195620992fc31705d2f45d3adf6e.sol#530-546) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_boost.attackBoost + _tile.blockValue >= _tile.blockValue) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe859060db5cb195620992fc31705d2f45d3adf6e.sol#535-536)
	- require(bool)(_boost.defendBoost + _tile.blockValue >= _tile.blockValue) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe859060db5cb195620992fc31705d2f45d3adf6e.sol#542-543)
	- _tile.claimer == _defender (/unique_chucks/40/0xe859060db5cb195620992fc31705d2f45d3adf6e.sol#542-546)
	- _tile.claimer == _attacker (/unique_chucks/40/0xe859060db5cb195620992fc31705d2f45d3adf6e.sol#535-546)

BWData.BASE_TILE_PRICE_WEI should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xe859060db5cb195620992fc31705d2f45d3adf6e.sol#360-362)
BWService.WITHDRAW_FEE should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xe859060db5cb195620992fc31705d2f45d3adf6e.sol#61-62)
